Question: Xi'an Fengyu Information Technology Co,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Xi'an Fengyu Information Technology Co., Ltd

Product Highlight: CES 2024

- C Seed N1, a 137-inch foldable TV with a seamless picture and 180-degree screen rotation
- Xreal Air 2 Ultra, a compact AR/VR headset with competitive pricing and impressive image quality
- Supernal S-A2, an electric air taxi designed for short trips with modular upgrade capability
- Honda Saloon, an electric vehicle range featuring steer-by-wire controls and cool LED grilles
- ColdSnap, a 2-minute ice cream maker for restaurants, producing freshly made ice cream
- Bespoke Jet Bot Combo, a smart robot vacuum with mop that identifies and removes stains using AI
- Oclean X Ultra Wi-Fi Digital Toothbrush, featuring AI-controlled motor, interactive touchscreen, and bone conduction voice guide
- Doublepoint's software that turns an Android watch into a general-purpose controller for any device via Bluetooth

These products showcase innovative uses of AI and cutting-edge technology across various categories at CES 2024.
